job.title: Entry Level Full Stack Software Engineer
job.industry: Computer Hardware,Computer Software,Information Technology and Services
job.description: There are not many times in your career when you get the opportunity to change a multibillion dollar franchise work with scary smart people and build out your resume so that it is the envy of your friends Welcome to HPs Instant Ink organization Using agile methodologies combined with paired programming you will be working with the most cutting edge and web technologies such as ltstronggtReact Ruby on Rails Nodejs Splunk New Relic Jenkins AWSltstronggt and others There will be weekly deploys of your software and realtime access to performance telemetryltbrgtltbrgtWith HP Instant Ink our goal is to address the 1 pain point consumers have been telling us about printing cost of ink Through a new and innovative model we will transform the global inkjet market by changing the perceived value of ink while enabling additional new revenue generating business models HP Instant Ink represents one of the top strategic priorities for HPs Print organization and will give you visibility at the highest levels in the companyltbrgtltbrgtOur organization is reinventing how customers print We have developed an exciting new business model where customers just pay for the pages they print  wwwhpinstantinkcom  You could be part of this team building new software and servicesltbrgtltbrgtThis is an exciting opportunity to develop and grow the web presence and rich processing required to massively scale this business for HP We are looking for a few highly motivated and talented web developers to join the team and help grow our solution This is an exciting time to join and learn agile testfocused development pair programming based around web services and technologies in a real and profitable business environment Join the fastpaced organization that is reinventing printing for the consumerltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtMusthavesltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtltstronggtAdditional Job Details ltbrgtltstronggtltulgtltligtRecent Bachelors undergraduate or above degree in
